languages.text: {n}Иокаста Зауэрбэк сошла бы за иллюстрацию к слову "дисциплина": форма идеально выглажена, броня начищена, а по осанке можно сверять прямые углы. Единственная несовершенная деталь в ее вышколенном облике — это потертая, со следами ударов тяжелая булава блюстителя. Женщина салютует отточенным движением.{/n} "Приветствую, Лорд-капитан!"

{n}Jocasta Sauerback is the very picture of discipline. Her uniform is exquisitely pressed, her armour is polished, and her posture is imposing and rigid. The only flaw in her immaculate appearance is the heavy enforcer's maul, which is worn and battered from frequent use. She salutes you with a practised motion.{/n} "Greetings, Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: {n}Иокаста Зауэрбэк сошла бы за иллюстрацию к слову "дисциплина": форма идеально выглажена, броня начищена, а по осанке можно сверять прямые углы. Единственная несовершенная деталь в ее вышколенном облике — это потертая, со следами ударов тяжелая булава блюстителя. Женщина салютует отточенным движением.{/n} "Приветствую, Лорд-капитан!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jocasta Sauerback is the very picture of discipline. her uniform is perfectly pressed, her armour is polished, and her posture is imposing and rigid. The only imperfect detail in her well-manicured appearance is the heavy enforcer's mace, worn and battered with frequent use. She salutes you with a practiced motion.{/n} "Greetings, Lord Captain!"

{n}Jocasta Sauerback is the very picture of discipline. Her uniform is exquisitely pressed, her armour is polished, and her posture is imposing and rigid. The only flaw in her immaculate appearance is the heavy enforcer's maul, which is worn and battered from frequent use. She salutes you with a practised motion.{/n} "Greetings, Lord Captain!"

languages.text: {n}Jocasta Sauerback est l'incarnation même de la discipline : son uniforme, repassé avec soin, n'arbore pas le moindre pli, son armure est polie à l'extrême, et sa posture rigide la rend d'autant plus imposante. Seul bémol dans son apparence autrement immaculée, le merlin à fendre visiblement très fréquemment utilisé qui pend à sa ceinture. Elle vous salue.{/n} « Salut à vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Jocasta Sauerback is the very picture of discipline. Her uniform is exquisitely pressed, her armour is polished, and her posture is imposing and rigid. The only flaw in her immaculate appearance is the heavy enforcer's maul, which is worn and battered from frequent use. She salutes you with a practised motion.{/n} "Greetings, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jocasta Sauerback est l'incarnation même de la discipline : son uniforme, repassé avec soin, n'arbore pas le moindre pli, son armure est polie à l'extrême, et sa posture rigide la rend d'autant plus imposante. Seul bémol dans son apparence autrement immaculée, le merlin à fendre visiblement très fréquemment utilisé qui pend à sa ceinture. Elle vous salue.{/n} « Salut à vous, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! »

languages.text: {n}Jocasta Sauerback es el retrato perfecto de la disciplina. Su uniforme está planchado a la perfección, su armadura está pulida y su postura es imponente y rígida. El único error en su apariencia inmaculada es su pesada maza de seguridad, desgastada por el uso. Te dedica un saludo militar en un gesto practicado.{/n} «¡Saludos, Lord Capitán!».
languages.original_text: {n}Jocasta Sauerback is the very picture of discipline. Her uniform is exquisitely pressed, her armour is polished, and her posture is imposing and rigid. The only flaw in her immaculate appearance is the heavy enforcer's maul, which is worn and battered from frequent use. She salutes you with a practised motion.{/n} "Greetings, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jocasta Sauerback es el retrato perfecto de la disciplina. Su uniforme está planchado a la perfección, su armadura está pulida y su postura es imponente y rígida. El único error en su apariencia inmaculada es su pesada maza de seguridad, desgastada por el uso. Te dedica un saludo militar en un gesto practicado.{/n} «¡Saludos, Lord Capitán!».

languages.text: {n}约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克就是“戒律”这个词的化身。她的制服熨得板板正正，身上的护甲擦得一尘不染，动作冷硬，充满威严。她几乎完美无瑕的外表之下，唯一的瑕疵就是她手中沉重的执法者战锤，由于使用得过于频繁而满是凹痕。她以熟练的动作向你致敬。{/n}“您好，舰长大人！”
languages.original_text: {n}Jocasta Sauerback is the very picture of discipline. Her uniform is exquisitely pressed, her armour is polished, and her posture is imposing and rigid. The only flaw in her immaculate appearance is the heavy enforcer's maul, which is worn and battered from frequent use. She salutes you with a practised motion.{/n} "Greetings, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}约卡斯塔·苏尔贝克就是“戒律”这个词的化身。她的制服熨得板板正正，身上的护甲擦得一尘不染，动作冷硬，充满威严。她几乎完美无瑕的外表之下，唯一的瑕疵就是她手中沉重的执法者战锤，由于使用得过于频繁而满是凹痕。她以熟练的动作向你致敬。{/n}“您好，舰长大人！”

languages.text: {n}ジョカスタ・ザウアーバックはまさに規律を絵に描いたような女性だ。制服には丁寧にアイロンがかけられていて、鎧は磨き上げられ、姿勢はきりっとしている。彼女の外見に唯一欠点があるとすれば、執行官の重いモールだ。これは頻繁に使用するため摩耗し、ボロボロになっている。彼女は慣れた動作であなたに敬礼した。{/n}「こんにちは、ロード・キャプテン！」
languages.original_text: {n}Jocasta Sauerback is the very picture of discipline. Her uniform is exquisitely pressed, her armour is polished, and her posture is imposing and rigid. The only flaw in her immaculate appearance is the heavy enforcer's maul, which is worn and battered from frequent use. She salutes you with a practised motion.{/n} "Greetings, Lord Captain!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ジョカスタ・ザウアーバックはまさに規律を絵に描いたような女性だ。制服には丁寧にアイロンがかけられていて、鎧は磨き上げられ、姿勢はきりっとしている。彼女の外見に唯一欠点があるとすれば、執行官の重いモールだ。これは頻繁に使用するため摩耗し、ボロボロになっている。彼女は慣れた動作であなたに敬礼した。{/n}「こんにちは、ロード・キャプテン！」

languages.text: {n}Jocasta Sauerback ist der Inbegriff der Disziplin. Ihre Uniform ist perfekt geglättet, ihre Rüstung ist poliert, ihre Haltung ist imposant und steif. Nur eines sticht aus ihrer ansonsten makellosen Erscheinung heraus: Der schwere Enforcer-Streitkolben, durch häufigen Gebrauch ramponiert und abgenutzt. Sie salutiert mit einer geübten Bewegung vor dir. {/n}"Seid mir gegrüßt, Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jocasta Sauerback is the very picture of discipline. Her uniform is exquisitely pressed, her armour is polished, and her posture is imposing and rigid. The only flaw in her immaculate appearance is the heavy enforcer's maul, which is worn and battered from frequent use. She salutes you with a practised motion.{/n} "Greetings, Lord Captain!"

languages.text: {n}Jocasta Sauerback, tam bir disiplin abidesi. Üniforması özenle ütülenmiş, zırhı parlatılmış ve azametli, katı bir duruşa sahip. Kusursuz görünüşündeki tek kusur, sık kullanımdan kaynaklı olarak aşınmış ve yıpranmış olan ağır infazcı tokmağı. Karşında eğitimli bir hareketle selam duruyor.{/n} "Selamlarımı sunarım Lord Kaptan!"
languages.original_text: {n}Jocasta Sauerback is the very picture of discipline. Her uniform is exquisitely pressed, her armour is polished, and her posture is imposing and rigid. The only flaw in her immaculate appearance is the heavy enforcer's maul, which is worn and battered from frequent use. She salutes you with a practised motion.{/n} "Greetings, Lord Captain!"
